name: Kasol
description: Arrive in Kasol and stay in specially set up camps near the river-side. You can also head out locally and enjoy sightseeing. The sound of flowing water of the river is sure to make you feel closer to nature, you can also enjoy the party arrangements specially set up for you.

name: Barshaini
description: Travel to Barshaini (14 km from Kasol) by bus. The travel time is approximately one hour. Here, you will start the Kheerganga trek from Rudranag. The trek is almost 12 km long, and takes about 5-6 hours. By evening, you will be at Kheerganga, where you can unwind and relax amidst the beautiful mountain views of Kheerganga and the valley. Your overnight stay at Kheerganga will be in camps set up at perfect locations, which will allow you to take in the beauty and vibe.

name: Kheerganga
description: Start your day with a relaxing natural hot spring shower. After this, have a hearty breakfast in your camp location. Then, start your journey back to Barshaini. This trek takes about 4 hours. From Barshaini, travel to Kasol by bus and get a taste of the one of a kind caf√© culture of Kasol. Relax for a bit, maybe explore the local market and peek into the Pahadi culture. At night, leave for your onward destinations by Volvo.
